meanings.definition: The act of transferring ownership of property by signing a deed.
meanings.sent1: The deeding of the house to the new owner was completed smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She finalized the deeding of the land to her children in her will.
meanings.sent3: The deeding ceremony for the park turned into a joyful celebration.
meanings.sent4: His deeding of the antique car to his son symbolized their bond.
meanings.sent5: The deeding process involves legal documents and signatures.

meanings.sent1: She is deeding the property to her sister.
meanings.sent2: They were deeding the house when the storm hit.
meanings.sent3: He kept deeding the papers back and forth, trying to organize them.
meanings.sent4: The artist was deeding colors onto the canvas with precision.
meanings.sent5: Deeding the contract will make it official and binding.

meanings.definition: The act of performing a deed.
meanings.sent1: The deeding of the heroic act was recognized by the community.
meanings.sent2: Her deeding of kindness towards others never goes unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The deeding of bravery in the face of danger inspired others.
meanings.sent4: His deeding of generosity touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The deeding of good deeds creates a ripple effect of positivity.
